title.rendered: TTE Products & Solutions attends Danfoss’ SET in KSA

content.rendered:
TTE Products & Solutions’ KSA Team represented by Abin Kurian, Sr. Sales Manager and Ahmad Mahmoud, Sales Engineer attended the Saudi Efficiency Tomorrow (#SET) event organized by Danfoss in Riyadh, showcasing their innovative solutions that are aligned with Saudi Vision 2030 and KSA’s vision to go carbon neutral by 2060.

Danfoss reiterated its commitment to decarbonizing sectors such as HVAC, Industrial Refrigeration, Supermarkets, Data Centers, and more with their sustainable and cutting-edge solutions.
